function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"People gathering on balconies increases the risk of contagious disease transmission.","Impact":"Potential for increased spread of contagious diseases such as COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Limiting the number of people on balconies and promoting social distancing.","Technologies":"Monitoring and surveillance technology to ensure compliance with gathering restrictions.","People":"Residents, visitors, and neighbors in the apartment building.","Owner":"Apartment management and local health authorities."}]}
